stim_text: February has the fewest days of all months.
The Earth is smaller than the Sun.
It is wrong to knowingly buy sandals made using sweatshop labor.
Professors should not tolerate students cheating on their exams.
Killing grey wolves is wrong, even if they are overpopulated.
Students should get a good night sleep before a makeup final exam.
People should sit close to the stage for a theatre performance.
The goal of sports should be to teach children that respect for others is more important than winning.
In winter, people should wear button-down coats and scarfs.
Restaurant owners should evenly distribute tips among waiters.
Hearing both sides of an argument makes for stimulating discussion.
People should sit near the window in a restaurant.
People should not write in borrowed books.
People should not talk on their phones in a public bathroom.
Doctors should not refuse to treat sick patients.
Learning through the internet is more interesting than visiting a library.
A tattoo artist should get a verbal consent from customers.
Watching movies with friends is enjoyable.
Afterschool programs involving sports are more fun than most of the alternatives available to children.
We should stop developing robots, as they will destroy jobs.
Taxi drivers should not rip off tourists.
It is wrong to cheat when playing games such as Monopoly.
People should not spit on the streets.
You shouldn't embarrass or humiliate your friends.
In the wintertime, it is fun to catch snowflakes on the tip of your tongue.
Stomach cancer is the worst disease you can have.
People who torture their pets are vile.
Zookeepers should keep safe and clean environments for animals.
Students should not copy a classmate's answer sheet on a makeup final exam.
Having blood drawn is not a pleasurable experience.
Students should not have loud conversations during lectures.
It is justifiable to harm cockroaches just because you find them disgusting.
Controversial speakers should be allowed to speak at colleges.
Students should familiarize themselves with many Philosophy texts.
Employees should always dress professionally.
On a plane, people should not stand up as soon as the seat-belt sign goes off.
Dogs make better pets than lizards.
Students should not skip classes.
People should walk to their work.
Teachers should not shame students for falling asleep in class.
A taxi driver should play soothing music when picking up a customer.
People should not litter in the beach.
A public pool should leave lifeguarding duties to parents.
People should borrow textbooks from the library.
House owners should not enforce water-usage limits to their tenants.
A car recall is the only acceptable option when a safety risk is found.
A tattoo artist should have many original tattoo designs.
Dog racing is harmful and exploitative to the dogs being raced.
Children should not put their parents into nursing homes.
It is irresponsible for airlines to risk the safety of their passengers.
Watching movies from illegal websites is deplorable.
House owners should decorate their rooms with string lights.
A car recall is inconvenient for people with long commutes.
Parents should give medication to their sick children.
A mother should make peanut butter jelly sandwich for lunch.
Money spent on space project is wasteful.
People should pack food for a beach day.
Using straws to drink is much more enjoyable than drinking directly from the cup.
Teenagers should make sure to exercise at least once per day.
Using straws is harmful to the environment.
Rock music is pleasing to the ear, and much more agreeable than rap music.
Gamblers should not bet their children's college funds.
It is not OK for doctors to accidentally kill a small number of patients per year.
After a game, athletes should Instagram post about the game results.
Politicians should dress casually when going out for family dinner.
The Harry Potter books are engaging and delightful to read, even for adults.
Gazing at planets through a telescope is a satisfying activity.
Gamblers should bet with real money, as it is more exciting.
Children should not take all the Halloween candies for themselves.
The deplorable conditions of Chinese electronics workers should not be ignored.
While at a hot beach, it is pleasant to dip your toes in the cool water.
Children should learn how to play an instrument.
Dogs are not worth the stress and aggravation it takes to own them.
A mother should allow her children the freedom to pursue their own interests.
Women should wear white wedding dresses.
People should have workplace fire drills in the morning.
Harry Potter should be banned from school libraries for idolizing witchcraft.
Soccer fans should shout football chants during home games.
Good Americans buy American cars, such as Hummers.
Teenagers who bully their classmates should be scolded.
Teachers should visit their students' houses regularly.
In a cafe, people should clean after themselves.
Toxic plastics should not be used in children's markers.
Students should take classes outside their comfort zones.
A married couple should not have an affair.
Supermarkets should sell a variety of different cereal brands.
A football referee should not help his favored team win.
Many games are better than Monopoly, which is incredibly boring.
Parents should pack ramen for lunch on a rainy day.
Nothing is more awesome than driving in a Hummer.
Smokers should not smoke close to animals.
Churchgoers should donate generously to the collection plate.
Doctors should accept cash, check, or credit card for payment.
Runners should not bump into pedestrians in the street.
